mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_idx, c.item_idx, c.users_email, c.cart_amount,c.cart_price, i.item_title, i.item_price, i.item_image FROM cart c, item i WHERE c.item_idx = i.item_idx AND c.users_email = #{users_email} ORDER BY c.cart_idx DESC
SELECT i.item_price FROM cart c, item i WHERE c.item_idx = i.item_idx AND c.cart_idx = #{cart_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_idx, item_idx, users_email, cart_amount, cart_price) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{item_idx}, #{users_email}, #{cart_amount}, #{cart_price})
